EmailTemplate.name: CA - Application Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Community Solar application has been approved!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Name},
Your BlueWave Community Solar Application has been approved! Let's do this thing, BlueWaver.
You will shortly receive an email from DocuSign containing your contract. It can be signed and sent back to us electronically, and you have 30 days to review and execute the contract before your application expires.
- Thanks from all of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
